name: Trash Blasters
description:
Made for the #TeamSeas Sea Jam

__________________________________________________________

My first published game! For a good cause as well! Used GDevelop5 to make it, because I don't know anything when it comes to actual coding languages. MillerTheGreat helped out with creating sprites, while I made the sound effects, and I genuinely enjoy how they and the game turned out. I hope you all like my first game :)

__________________________________________________________

Blast away trash and watch out for local sealife! If you accidentally zap sealife, you will be penalized. If you are hit, or let any trash escape, you will also be penalized. Try to get the highest score you can. Shoot Heart PowerUps to gain an extra life. Colliding with the PowerUp does not award benefit. Good luck and have fun!

__________________________________________________________

Sound Effects may lag the first time they are loaded.

__________________________________________________________

Default Controls are:

Move Up : Up Arrow Key

Move Down : Down Arrow Key

Zap : Spacebar

Controls CAN be changed through settings if you'd like.

__________________________________________________________

Credits:

MillerTheGreatYT - Sprite Work (Sock, Mask, Six Pack Can Holder), Playtester

Pixel Font : Rainy Hearts - https://www.dafont.com/rainyhearts.font

Title Font : Fighting Spirit TBS - https://www.fontspace.com/fighting-spirit-tbs-font-f7045

Developed with GDevelop5
